name: Michael Discenza
tagline: My home on the internet for now
body:
### About
A business-minded statistician/data scientist looking for challenging data problems to solve a wide range of fields. I am as comfortable in client-focused roles(front end web client and real breathing people clients) and strategic as I am writing code and building statistical models, but prefer to split my time between those two activities. 

I am recently finished a masters degree in statistics at Columbia, focusing mainly on machine learning. I have a background in social science research and passion for using computing for social good.  

Available for freelance data analysis/statistical programming and portrait or event photography.

My photographic work can be found at [mdiscenza.tumblr.com](mdiscenza.tumblr.com) and [www.zenfolio.com/mdiscenza/](www.zenfolio.com/mdiscenza/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
